introduction: This series will document the most important battles of the European theatre, from the Blitzkrieg attack on Poland in 1939 to the Battle for Berlin in 1945. Gripping real life stories are brought to life in never before seen colorized battle footage.S1 E1 - BlitzkriegGermany's "Lightning War" on France is explored through never-before-seen colorized battle footage, newsreels, and personal, firsthand accounts.S1 E2 - BarbarossaColorized combat footage and home movies give a rare look at Nazi Germany's invasion of the Soviet Union.S1 E3 - El AlameinColorized news footage and Nazi propaganda films give a rare look at the key World War II battles in the deserts of North Africa.S1 E4 - KurskNewly colorized combat footage and home movies tell the story of the greatest tank battle of WWII, between the Nazis' mighty Tigers and Russia's T-34s.S1 E5 - The BulgeColorized footage of the Battle of the Bulge captures the brutality of America's biggest, bloodiest conflict of World War II.S1 E6 - BerlinColorized newsreel and propaganda footage of the Soviet's assault on Berlin provides a unique, vivid look at the final weeks of World War II.
